scripts.dev: node_modules/.bin/esbuild app.js --bundle --outfile=out.bundle.js --watch=forever & PID="$!"; python -m http.server; kill $PID
scripts.build: node_modules/.bin/esbuild app.js --bundle --minify --outfile=out.bundle.js && mkdir -p build && cp -t build out.bundle.js index.html && zip -9 game.zip build/* && ls -lh game.zip
